query.sql: --- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct to_char(d.CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATED , d.DBID , d.NAME , i.INST_ID , i.INSTANCE_NAME , d.LOG_MODE , d.OPEN_MODE , i.STATUS INST_STATUS , i.LOGINS , i.DATABASE_STATUS , i.INSTANCE_ROLE , i.ACTIVE_STATE , i.VERSION , to_char(i.STARTUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') STARTUP_TIME , (systimestamp-i.STARTUP_TIME) UPTIME , i.HOST_NAME , d.FORCE_LOGGING , tp.platform_name , tp.endian_format from gv$instance i , gv$database d , gv$transportable_platform tp where lower(d.name) = lower(substr(i.INSTANCE_NAME, 1, length(d.NAME))) AND d.platform_id = tp.platform_id order by INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct to_char(d.CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATED , d.DBID , d.NAME , i.INST_ID , i.INSTANCE_NAME , d.LOG_MODE , d.OPEN_MODE , i.STATUS INST_STATUS , i.LOGINS , i.DATABASE_STATUS , i.INSTANCE_ROLE , i.ACTIVE_STATE , i.VERSION , to_char(i.STARTUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') STARTUP_TIME , (systimestamp-i.STARTUP_TIME) UPTIME , i.HOST_NAME , d.FORCE_LOGGING , tp.platform_name , tp.endian_format , i.CON_ID , i.INSTANCE_MODE , i.EDITION , i.FAMILY , i.DATABASE_TYPE from gv$instance i , gv$database d , gv$transportable_platform tp where lower(d.name) = lower(substr(i.INSTANCE_NAME, 1, length(d.NAME))) AND d.platform_id = tp.platform_id order by INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select Name , value , ISSES_MODIFIABLE "SESSION MODIFIABLE" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE "SYSTEM MODIFIABLE" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE "INSTANCE MODIFIABLE" , DESCRIPTION , CASE WHEN ISSYS_MODIFIABLE='IMMEDIATE' THEN 'ALTER SYSTEM SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||' SCOPE=BOTH SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' ELSE 'ALTER SYSTEM SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SYSTEM" , CASE WHEN ISSES_MODIFIABLE='TRUE' THEN 'ALTER SESSION SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||';' ELSE NULL --'ALTER SESSION SET '||NAME||'='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SESSION" from gv$parameter where INST_ID = :INST_ID and ISDEFAULT = 'FALSE' order by Name , value

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select Name , value , ISSES_MODIFIABLE "SESSION MODIFIABLE" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE "SYSTEM MODIFIABLE" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE "INSTANCE MODIFIABLE" , ISPDB_MODIFIABLE "PDB MODIFIABLE" , DESCRIPTION , CASE WHEN ISSYS_MODIFIABLE='IMMEDIATE' THEN 'ALTER SYSTEM SET '||NAME||'="'||VALUE||'" SCOPE=BOTH SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' ELSE 'ALTER SYSTEM SET '||NAME||'="'||VALUE||'" SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SYSTEM" , CASE WHEN ISSES_MODIFIABLE='TRUE' THEN 'ALTER SESSION SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||';' ELSE NULL --'ALTER SESSION SET '||NAME||'='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SESSION" from gv$parameter where INST_ID = :INST_ID and ISDEFAULT = 'FALSE' order by Name , value
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , PARAMETER , VALUE from gv$nls_parameters where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by PARAMETER
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , CON_ID , PARAMETER , VALUE from gv$nls_parameters where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by PARAMETER

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select Name , value , ISSES_MODIFIABLE "SESSION MODIFIABLE" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE "SYSTEM MODIFIABLE" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE "INSTANCE MODIFIABLE" , ISDEFAULT "IS DEFAULT" , DESCRIPTION , CASE WHEN ISSYS_MODIFIABLE='IMMEDIATE' THEN 'ALTER SYSTEM SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||' SCOPE=BOTH SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' ELSE 'ALTER SYSTEM SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SYSTEM" , CASE WHEN ISSES_MODIFIABLE='TRUE' THEN 'ALTER SESSION SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||';' ELSE NULL --'ALTER SESSION SET '||NAME||'='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SESSION" from gv$parameter where INST_ID = :INST_ID --and --ISDEFAULT = 'FALSE' order by Name , value /* DO NOT DELETE even if it is commented. Below SQL gives list of valid values for NON NULL parameters --AND --ISDEFAULT = 'FALSE' */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select Name , value , ISSES_MODIFIABLE "SESSION MODIFIABLE" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE "SYSTEM MODIFIABLE" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE "INSTANCE MODIFIABLE" , ISPDB_MODIFIABLE "PDB MODIFIABLE" , ISDEFAULT "IS DEFAULT" , DESCRIPTION , CASE WHEN ISSYS_MODIFIABLE='IMMEDIATE' THEN 'ALTER SYSTEM SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||' SCOPE=BOTH SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' ELSE 'ALTER SYSTEM SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SYSTEM" , CASE WHEN ISSES_MODIFIABLE='TRUE' THEN 'ALTER SESSION SET "'||NAME||'"='||VALUE||';' ELSE NULL --'ALTER SESSION SET '||NAME||'='||VALUE||' SCOPE=SPFILE SID='||''''||'*'||''''||';' END "ALTER SESSION" from gv$parameter where INST_ID = :INST_ID --and --ISDEFAULT = 'FALSE' order by Name , value /* DO NOT DELETE even if it is commented. Below SQL gives list of valid values for NON NULL parameters --AND --ISDEFAULT = 'FALSE' */

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) --List of valid values for NON NULL parameters select name , value , ISDEFAULT , ISSES_MODIFIABLE "SESSION MODIFIABLE" , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE "SYSTEM MODIFIABLE" , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE "INSTANCE MODIFIABLE" , SUBSTR(SYS_CONNECT_BY_PATH(VALID_VALUES, ', '),2) VALID_VALUES , DESCRIPTION from ( select p.name , p.value , p.ISDEFAULT , pvv.value VALID_VALUES , ISSES_MODIFIABLE , ISSYS_MODIFIABLE , ISINSTANCE_MODIFIABLE , DESCRIPTION , COUNT(*) OVER ( partition BY pvv.name) cnt , ROW_NUMBER () OVER ( partition BY pvv.name order by p.name, pvv.value) seq from gv$parameter_valid_values pvv , gv$parameter p where P.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND p.INST_ID = pvv.INST_ID(+) AND p.name = pvv.name(+) --AND --p.VALUE = pvv.value(+) AND --p.ISDEFAULT = pvv.ISDEFAULT(+) ) where seq = cnt START WITH seq = 1 CONNECT BY prior seq+1 = seq AND prior name = name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT inst_id , Sum(Decode(a.name, 'consistent gets', a.value, 0)) "Consistent Gets" , Sum(Decode(a.name, 'db block gets', a.value, 0)) "DB Block Gets" , Sum(Decode(a.name, 'physical reads', a.value, 0)) "Physical Reads" , Round(((Sum(Decode(a.name, 'consistent gets', a.value, 0)) + Sum(Decode(a.name, 'db block gets', a.value, 0)) - Sum(Decode(a.name, 'physical reads', a.value, 0)) )/ (Sum(Decode(a.name, 'consistent gets', a.value, 0)) + Sum(Decode(a.name, 'db block gets', a.value, 0)))) *100,2) "Hit Ratio %" FROM gv$sysstat a where inst_id = :INST_ID group by inst_id order by inst_id

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT l.name , l.gets , l.misses , round((1 - (l.misses / l.gets)) * 100, 2) AS latch_hit_ratio FROM gv$latch l WHERE l.gets != 0 AND INST_ID = :INST_ID /* UNION SELECT l.name , l.gets , l.misses , 100 AS latch_hit_ratio FROM gv$latch l WHERE l.gets = 0 AND INST_ID = :INST_ID */ ORDER BY latch_hit_ratio DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT l.name "Latch Name" , lh.pid "PID" , lh.sid "SID" , l.gets "Gets (Wait)" , l.misses "Misses (Wait)" , l.sleeps "Sleeps (Wait)" , l.immediate_gets "Gets (No Wait)" , l.immediate_misses "Misses (Wait)" FROM gv$latch l , gv$latchholder lh WHERE l.addr = lh.laddr AND l.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND lh.INST_ID = :INST_ID ORDER BY l.name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT a.child# , a.name , round(a.SLEEPS / decode(a.GETS, 0, 1, a.GETS) * 100, 2) "Ratio %" FROM gv$latch_children a WHERE --a.name = 'cache buffers lru chain' and a.INST_ID = :INST_ID ORDER BY 1

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT a.namespace "Name Space" , a.gets "Get Requests" , a.gethits "Get Hits" , Round(a.gethitratio,2) "Get Ratio" , a.pins "Pin Requests" , a.pinhits "Pin Hits" , Round(a.pinhitratio,2) "Pin Ratio" , a.reloads "Reloads" , a.invalidations "Invalidations" FROM gv$librarycache a where INST_ID = :INST_ID ORDER BY a.namespace

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , OPER_TYPE , OPER_MODE , PARAMETER , CASE WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INITIAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END INITIAL_SIZE --, INITIAL_SIZE , CASE WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TARGET_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TARGET_SIZE --, TARGET_SIZE , CASE WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FINAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END FINAL_SIZE --, FINAL_SIZE , STATUS , to_char(START_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') START_TIME --, START_TIME , to_char(END_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') END_TIME --, END_TIME from GV$SGA_RESIZE_OPS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND trunc(START_TIME) between trunc(sysdate) - 2 and trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by COMPONENT , START_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , CASE WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END CURRENT_SIZE --, CURRENT_SIZE , CASE WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MIN_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES --, MIN_SIZE , CASE WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END MAX_SIZE --, MAX_SIZE , CASE WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE --, USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE , OPER_COUNT , LAST_OPER_TYPE , LAST_OPER_MODE , to_char(LAST_OPER_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') LAST_OPER_TIME --, LAST_OPER_TIME , CASE WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' GB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' MB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/1024,2),'FM990.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(GRANULE_SIZE,'FM9900.00') || ' ' END GRANULE_SIZE --, GRANULE_SIZE from GV$SGA_DYNAMIC_COMPONENTS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND LAST_OPER_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by LAST_OPER_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , NAME , CASE WHEN BYTES > (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024),2)) || ' GB' WHEN BYTES > (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024),2)) || ' MB' WHEN BYTES > 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/1024,2)) || ' KB' ELSE BYTES || ' ' END BYTES from gv$sgainfo where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , OPER_TYPE , OPER_MODE , PARAMETER , CASE WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INITIAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END INITIAL_SIZE --, INITIAL_SIZE , CASE WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TARGET_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TARGET_SIZE --, TARGET_SIZE , CASE WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FINAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END FINAL_SIZE --, FINAL_SIZE , STATUS , to_char(START_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') START_TIME --, START_TIME , to_char(END_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') END_TIME --, END_TIME from GV$MEMORY_RESIZE_OPS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND trunc(START_TIME) between trunc(sysdate) - 2 and trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by COMPONENT , START_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , CASE WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END CURRENT_SIZE --, CURRENT_SIZE , CASE WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MIN_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES --, MIN_SIZE , CASE WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END MAX_SIZE --, MAX_SIZE , CASE WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE --, USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE , OPER_COUNT , LAST_OPER_TYPE , LAST_OPER_MODE , to_char(LAST_OPER_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') LAST_OPER_TIME --, LAST_OPER_TIME , CASE WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' GB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' MB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/1024,2),'FM990.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(GRANULE_SIZE,'FM9900.00') || ' ' END GRANULE_SIZE --, GRANULE_SIZE from GV$MEMORY_DYNAMIC_COMPONENTS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND LAST_OPER_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by LAST_OPER_TIME DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'opened cursors cumulative' , 'opened cursors current' , 'session cursor cache hits' , 'session cursor cache count' , 'cursor authentications' , 'parse count (total)' , 'parse count (hard)' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID order by STAT_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'user commits' , 'user rollbacks' , 'user calls' , 'recursive calls' , 'execute count' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID order by STAT_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'logons cumulative' , 'logons current' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID order by STAT_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'session logical reads' , 'db block gets' , 'consistent gets' , 'db block changes' , 'consistent changes' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID order by STAT_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'physical reads' , 'physical writes' , 'physical reads direct' , 'physical writes direct' , 'physical writes non checkpoint' , 'redo size' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID order by STAT_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'bytes sent via SQL*Net to client' , 'bytes received via SQL*Net from client' , 'SQL*Net roundtrips to/from client' , 'bytes sent via SQL*Net to dblink' , 'bytes received via SQL*Net from dblink' , 'SQL*Net roundtrips to/from dblink' , 'messages sent' , 'messages received' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID order by STAT_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select inst_id , name , value from gv$sysstat where name in ( 'table scan rows gotten' , 'table scan blocks gotten' , 'table fetch by rowid' , 'table fetch by rowid' , 'table fetch continued row' ) AND INST_ID = :INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , BEGIN_TIME , END_TIME , UNDOTSN , UNDOBLKS , TXNCOUNT , MAXQUERYLEN , MAXQUERYID , MAXCONCURRENCY , UNXPSTEALCNT , UNXPBLKRELCNT , UNXPBLKREUCNT , EXPSTEALCNT , EXPBLKRELCNT , EXPBLKREUCNT , SSOLDERRCNT , NOSPACEERRCNT , ACTIVEBLKS , UNEXPIREDBLKS , EXPIREDBLKS , TUNED_UNDORETENTION from GV$UNDOSTAT where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by BEGIN_TIME DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select ss.INST_ID , TABLESPACE_NAME , OBJECT_TYPE , OWNER , OBJECT_NAME , STATISTIC_NAME , VALUE from gv$segment_statistics ss , gv$segstat_name sn where sn.STATISTIC# = ss.STATISTIC# AND sn.SAMPLED = 'YES' AND ss.VALUE > 0 AND ss.INST_ID = :INST_ID AND owner not in ( 'APEX_030200' , 'APEX_PUBLIC_USER' , 'APPQOSSYS' , 'CTXSYS' , 'DBSNMP' , 'DIP' , 'EXFSYS' , 'FLOWS_FILES' , 'HR' , 'MDSYS' , 'OE' , 'OLAPSYS' , 'ORACLE_OCM' , 'ORDDATA' , 'ORDPLUGINS' , 'ORDSYS' , 'OUTLN' , 'OWBSYS_AUDIT' , 'OWBSYS' , 'SCOTT' , 'SH' , 'SI_INFORMTN_SCHEMA' , 'SYS' --, 'SYSMAN' --, 'SYSTEM' , 'WMSYS' , 'XDB' ) order by ss.INST_ID , OWNER , OBJECT_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT inst_id , wait_class , event , total_waits , total_timeouts --, time_waited , average_wait , CASE WHEN se.time_waited_micro/1000000 is null then ' ' WHEN se.time_waited_micro/1000000 > 3600*24 then TO_CHAR(TRUNC(se.time_waited_micro/1000000/3600/24),'FM9990') || 'd ' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,3600*24)/3600),'FM90')|| 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,60),'FM00')|| 's' ELSE TO_CHAR(TRUNC(se.time_waited_micro/1000000/3600),'FM90') || 'h:' || TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,3600)/60),'FM00') || 'm:' || TO_CHAR(MOD(se.time_waited_micro/1000000,60),'FM00')|| 's' END time_waited FROM gv$system_event se WHERE INST_ID = :INST_ID ORDER BY event
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT * FROM gv$diag_info where INST_ID = :INST_ID
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select * from gv$result_cache_objects where INST_ID = :INST_ID
--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT inst_id , id , name , value FROM gv$result_cache_statistics where INST_ID = :INST_ID ORDER BY id

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select NAME , NETWORK_NAME , CLB_GOAL , EDITION --, COMMIT_OUTCOME --, RETENTION_TIMEOUT --, REPLAY_INITIATION_TIMEOUT --, SESSION_STATE_CONSISTENCY --, GLOBAL_SERVICE --, PDB --, SQL_TRANSLATION_PROFILE --, MAX_LAG_TIME --, GSM_FLAGS , SERVICE_ID --, NAME_HASH --, CREATION_DATE , CREATION_DATE_HASH , FAILOVER_METHOD , FAILOVER_TYPE , FAILOVER_RETRIES , FAILOVER_DELAY , MIN_CARDINALITY , MAX_CARDINALITY , GOAL , DTP , ENABLED from dba_services order by NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select NAME , NETWORK_NAME , CLB_GOAL , EDITION , COMMIT_OUTCOME , RETENTION_TIMEOUT , REPLAY_INITIATION_TIMEOUT , SESSION_STATE_CONSISTENCY , GLOBAL_SERVICE , PDB , SQL_TRANSLATION_PROFILE , MAX_LAG_TIME , GSM_FLAGS , SERVICE_ID --, NAME_HASH , CREATION_DATE --, CREATION_DATE_HASH , FAILOVER_METHOD , FAILOVER_TYPE , FAILOVER_RETRIES , FAILOVER_DELAY , MIN_CARDINALITY , MAX_CARDINALITY , GOAL , DTP , ENABLED from dba_services order by NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT U1.DBID , U1.NAME , U1.VERSION , U1.DETECTED_USAGES , U1.TOTAL_SAMPLES , U1.CURRENTLY_USED , U1.FIRST_USAGE_DATE , U1.LAST_USAGE_DATE , U1.AUX_COUNT , U1.FEATURE_INFO , U1.LAST_SAMPLE_DATE , U1.LAST_SAMPLE_PERIOD , U1.SAMPLE_INTERVAL , U1.DESCRIPTION FROM dba_feature_usage_statistics u1 WHERE u1.detected_usages > 0 AND u1.dbid = :DBID AND u1.version = ( SELECT MAX(u2.version) FROM dba_feature_usage_statistics u2 WHERE u2.name = u1.name ) ORDER BY U1.NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT s.inst_id, osuser, machine, process, name, description, status FROM gv$session s, gv$bgprocess b WHERE s.paddr = b.paddr AND s.inst_id = b.inst_id AND s.inst_id = :INST_ID AND status = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY inst_id , name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) SELECT TO_CHAR( s.begin_interval_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM' ) snap_time , p.instance_number INST_ID , p.snap_id , p.name , p.old_value , p.new_value , DECODE( TRIM( translate( p.new_value, '0123456789', ' ' ) ), '', TRIM( TO_CHAR( to_number( p.new_value ) - to_number( p.old_value ), '999999999999990' ) ), '' ) diff FROM ( SELECT dbid , instance_number , snap_id , parameter_name name , LAG( TRIM( lower( value ) ) ) OVER( PARTITION BY dbid, instance_number, parameter_name ORDER BY snap_id ) old_value , TRIM( lower( value ) ) new_value , DECODE( nvl( LAG( TRIM( lower( value ) ) ) OVER( PARTITION BY dbid, instance_number, parameter_name ORDER BY snap_id ) , TRIM( lower( value ) ) ), TRIM( lower( value ) ), '~NO~CHANGE~', TRIM( lower( value ) ) ) diff FROM dba_hist_parameter ) p , dba_hist_snapshot s WHERE --s.begin_interval_time BETWEEN trunc( SYSDATE - :DAYS ) AND SYSDATE AND p.dbid = s.dbid AND p.instance_number = s.instance_number AND p.snap_id = s.snap_id AND p.diff <> '~NO~CHANGE~' AND p.instance_number = :INST_ID --AND --p.name = :PARAM_NAME ORDER BY snap_time , INST_ID , name

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , :NAME DB_NAME , WRL_TYPE , WRL_PARAMETER , STATUS --, WALLET_TYPE --, WALLET_ORDER --, FULLY_BACKED_UP --, CON_ID from gv$encryption_wallet where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , :NAME DB_NAME , WRL_TYPE , WRL_PARAMETER , STATUS , WALLET_TYPE , WALLET_ORDER , FULLY_BACKED_UP , CON_ID from gv$encryption_wallet where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by INST_ID

SELECT INST_ID , SERVICE_NAME , SERVICE_NAME_HASH , EVENT , EVENT_ID , TOTAL_WAITS , TOTAL_TIMEOUTS , TIME_WAITED , AVERAGE_WAIT , MAX_WAIT , TIME_WAITED_MICRO FROM GV$SERVICE_EVENT where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by SERVICE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct to_char(d.CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATED , d.DBID , d.NAME , i.INST_ID , i.INSTANCE_NAME , d.LOG_MODE , d.OPEN_MODE , i.STATUS INST_STATUS , i.LOGINS , i.DATABASE_STATUS , i.INSTANCE_ROLE , i.ACTIVE_STATE , i.VERSION , to_char(i.STARTUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') STARTUP_TIME , (systimestamp-i.STARTUP_TIME) UPTIME , i.HOST_NAME , tp.platform_name , tp.endian_format from gv$instance i , gv$database d , gv$transportable_platform tp where lower(d.name) = lower(substr(i.INSTANCE_NAME, 1, length(d.NAME))) AND d.platform_id = tp.platform_id order by INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE , series , ESTD_PGA_CACHE_HIT_PERCENTAGE from ( select INST_ID , PGA_TARGET_FACTOR , case when PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE > (1024*1024) then to_char(round(PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE/1024/1024/1024,2))||' GB' when PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE > (1024) then to_char(round(PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE/1024/1024,2))||' MB' else PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE || 'KB ' end PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE --, ESTD_PGA_CACHE_HIT_PERCENTAGE --, ESTD_TIME , :INSTANCE_NAME||chr(13)||chr(10)||' PGA Advice' series , ESTD_PGA_CACHE_HIT_PERCENTAGE , ESTD_OVERALLOC_COUNT from gv$pga_target_advice where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by -- PGA_TARGET_FOR_ESTIMATE asc --, INST_ID PGA_TARGET_FACTOR )

select NAME , CASE WHEN UNIT = 'bytes' and VALUE > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024/1024/1024,2)||'G' WHEN UNIT = 'bytes' and VALUE > to_number(1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024/1024,2)||'M' WHEN UNIT = 'bytes' and VALUE > to_number(1024) THEN round(to_number(VALUE)/1024,2)||'K' ELSE to_char(VALUE) END VALUE from gv$pgastat where inst_id = :INST_ID
select INSTANCE_NUMBER , NAME , VALUE from DBA_HIST_PGASTAT where INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID order by NAME , VALUE

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct to_char(d.CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATED , d.DBID , d.NAME , i.INST_ID , i.INSTANCE_NAME , d.LOG_MODE , d.OPEN_MODE , i.STATUS INST_STATUS , i.LOGINS , i.DATABASE_STATUS , i.INSTANCE_ROLE , i.ACTIVE_STATE , i.VERSION , to_char(i.STARTUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') STARTUP_TIME , (systimestamp-i.STARTUP_TIME) UPTIME , i.HOST_NAME , tp.platform_name , tp.endian_format from gv$instance i , gv$database d , gv$transportable_platform tp where lower(d.name) = lower(substr(i.INSTANCE_NAME, 1, length(d.NAME))) AND d.platform_id = tp.platform_id order by INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select SGA_SIZE , series --, round(ESTD_DB_TIME_FACTOR/SGA_SIZE_FACTOR,1) DB_TIME_FACTOR , ESTD_DB_TIME_FACTOR DB_TIME_FACTOR --, ESTD_DB_TIME/SGA_SIZE_FACTOR --, ESTD_DB_TIME from ( select INST_ID , SGA_SIZE_FACTOR , case when SGA_SIZE > (1024*1024) then to_char(round(SGA_SIZE/1024/1024,2))||' TB' when SGA_SIZE > (1024) then to_char(round(SGA_SIZE/1024,2))||' GB' else SGA_SIZE || ' MB' end SGA_SIZE , 'SGA Advice: '||:INSTANCE_NAME series , ESTD_DB_TIME_FACTOR --, ESTD_DB_TIME --, ESTD_PHYSICAL_READS from GV$SGA_TARGET_ADVICE where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by INST_ID , SGA_SIZE_FACTOR ) --order by --ESTD_DB_TIME_FACTOR/SGA_SIZE_FACTOR desc

select POOL , NAME , CASE WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024/1024/1024,2)||'G' WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024/1024,2)||'M' WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024,2)||'K' ELSE to_char(BYTES) END BYTES from gv$sgastat where inst_id = :INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , NAME , CASE WHEN BYTES > (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024*1024),3)) || ' GB' WHEN BYTES > (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/(1024*1024),3)) || ' MB' WHEN BYTES > 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(bytes/1024,3)) || ' KB' ELSE BYTES || ' ' END BYTES , RESIZEABLE from gv$sgainfo where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , CASE WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END CURRENT_SIZE --, CURRENT_SIZE , CASE WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MIN_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES --, MIN_SIZE , CASE WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END MAX_SIZE --, MAX_SIZE , CASE WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE --, USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE , OPER_COUNT , LAST_OPER_TYPE , LAST_OPER_MODE , to_char(LAST_OPER_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') LAST_OPER_TIME --, LAST_OPER_TIME , CASE WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' GB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' MB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/1024,2),'FM990.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(GRANULE_SIZE,'FM9900.00') || ' ' END GRANULE_SIZE --, GRANULE_SIZE from GV$SGA_DYNAMIC_COMPONENTS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND LAST_OPER_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by LAST_OPER_TIME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , OPER_TYPE , OPER_MODE , PARAMETER , CASE WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INITIAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END INITIAL_SIZE --, INITIAL_SIZE , CASE WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TARGET_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TARGET_SIZE --, TARGET_SIZE , CASE WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FINAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END FINAL_SIZE --, FINAL_SIZE , STATUS , to_char(START_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') START_TIME --, START_TIME , to_char(END_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') END_TIME --, END_TIME from GV$SGA_RESIZE_OPS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND trunc(START_TIME) between trunc(sysdate) - 2 and trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by COMPONENT , START_TIME

select INSTANCE_NUMBER , NAME , POOL , CASE WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024*1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024/1024/1024,2)||'G' WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024*1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024/1024,2)||'M' WHEN BYTES > to_number(1024) THEN round(to_number(BYTES)/1024,2)||'K' ELSE to_char(BYTES) END BYTES from DBA_HIST_SGASTAT where INSTANCE_NUMBER = :INST_ID

SELECT JAVA_POOL_SIZE_FOR_ESTIMATE , JAVA_POOL_SIZE_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_SIZE , ESTD_LC_MEMORY_OBJECTS , ESTD_LC_TIME_SAVED , ESTD_LC_TIME_SAVED_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_LOAD_TIME , ESTD_LC_LOAD_TIME_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_MEMORY_OBJECT_HITS , CON_ID AVA_POOL_SIZE_FOR_ESTIMATE , JAVA_POOL_SIZE_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_SIZE , ESTD_LC_MEMORY_OBJECTS , ESTD_LC_TIME_SAVED , ESTD_LC_TIME_SAVED_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_LOAD_TIME , ESTD_LC_LOAD_TIME_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_MEMORY_OBJECT_HITS , CON_ID FROM GV$JAVA_POOL_ADVICE where INST_ID = :INST_ID

SELECT SHARED_POOL_SIZE_FOR_ESTIMATE , SHARED_POOL_SIZE_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_SIZE , ESTD_LC_MEMORY_OBJECTS , ESTD_LC_TIME_SAVED , ESTD_LC_TIME_SAVED_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_LOAD_TIME , ESTD_LC_LOAD_TIME_FACTOR , ESTD_LC_MEMORY_OBJECT_HITS , CON_ID FROM GV$SHARED_POOL_ADVICE where INST_ID = :INST_ID

SELECT STREAMS_POOL_SIZE_FOR_ESTIMATE , STREAMS_POOL_SIZE_FACTOR , ESTD_SPILL_COUNT , ESTD_SPILL_TIME , ESTD_UNSPILL_COUNT , ESTD_UNSPILL_TIME , CON_ID FROM GV$STREAMS_POOL_ADVICE where INST_ID = :INST_ID

select INST_ID , case when CURRENT_SIZE > (1024*1024*1024) then to_char(round(CURRENT_SIZE/1024/1024/1024,2))||' GB' when CURRENT_SIZE > (1024*1024) then to_char(round(CURRENT_SIZE/1024/1024,2))||' MB' when CURRENT_SIZE > (1024) then to_char(round(CURRENT_SIZE/1024,2))||' KB' else CURRENT_SIZE || ' B' end CURRENT_SIZE from GV$SGA_DYNAMIC_FREE_MEMORY where INST_ID = :INST_ID

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select distinct to_char(d.CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') CREATED , d.DBID , d.NAME , i.INST_ID , i.INSTANCE_NAME , d.LOG_MODE , d.OPEN_MODE , i.STATUS INST_STATUS , i.LOGINS , i.DATABASE_STATUS , i.INSTANCE_ROLE , i.ACTIVE_STATE , i.VERSION , to_char(i.STARTUP_TIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS AM, DY') STARTUP_TIME , (systimestamp-i.STARTUP_TIME) UPTIME , i.HOST_NAME , tp.platform_name , tp.endian_format from gv$instance i , gv$database d , gv$transportable_platform tp where lower(d.name) = lower(substr(i.INSTANCE_NAME, 1, length(d.NAME))) AND d.platform_id = tp.platform_id order by INSTANCE_NAME

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select MEMORY_SIZE , series , ESTD_DB_TIME_FACTOR DB_TIME_FACTOR from ( select INST_ID , case when MEMORY_SIZE > (1024*1024) then to_char(round(MEMORY_SIZE/1024/1024,2))||' TB' when MEMORY_SIZE > (1024) then to_char(round(MEMORY_SIZE/1024,2))||' GB' else MEMORY_SIZE || ' MB' end MEMORY_SIZE , 'Memory Advice: '||:INSTANCE_NAME series , ESTD_DB_TIME_FACTOR , MEMORY_SIZE_FACTOR , ESTD_DB_TIME --, ESTD_PHYSICAL_READS from GV$MEMORY_TARGET_ADVICE where INST_ID = :INST_ID order by INST_ID , MEMORY_SIZE_FACTOR )

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , CASE WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN CURRENT_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(CURRENT_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(CURRENT_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END CURRENT_SIZE --, CURRENT_SIZE , CASE WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MIN_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MIN_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MIN_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END BYTES --, MIN_SIZE , CASE WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN MAX_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(MAX_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(MAX_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END MAX_SIZE --, MAX_SIZE , CASE WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE --, USER_SPECIFIED_SIZE , OPER_COUNT , LAST_OPER_TYPE , LAST_OPER_MODE , to_char(LAST_OPER_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') LAST_OPER_TIME --, LAST_OPER_TIME , CASE WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' GB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM990.00') || ' MB' WHEN GRANULE_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(GRANULE_SIZE/1024,2),'FM990.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(GRANULE_SIZE,'FM9900.00') || ' ' END GRANULE_SIZE --, GRANULE_SIZE from GV$MEMORY_DYNAMIC_COMPONENTS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND LAST_OPER_TIME > trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by LAST_OPER_TIME DESC

--- Author: Anand Mahajani --- Date: 2018/11/28 (of last update/validation) select INST_ID , COMPONENT , OPER_TYPE , OPER_MODE , PARAMETER , CASE WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN INITIAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(INITIAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(INITIAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END INITIAL_SIZE --, INITIAL_SIZE , CASE WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN TARGET_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(TARGET_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(TARGET_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END TARGET_SIZE --, TARGET_SIZE , CASE WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' PB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' TB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' GB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= (1024*1024) THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/(1024*1024),2),'FM000.00') || ' MB' WHEN FINAL_SIZE >= 1024 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(FINAL_SIZE/1024,2),'FM000.00') || ' KB' ELSE TO_CHAR(FINAL_SIZE,'FM9000.00') || ' ' END FINAL_SIZE --, FINAL_SIZE , STATUS , to_char(START_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') START_TIME --, START_TIME , to_char(END_TIME, 'DY DD-MON-YYYY HH:MI:SS AM') END_TIME --, END_TIME from GV$MEMORY_RESIZE_OPS where INST_ID = :INST_ID AND trunc(START_TIME) between trunc(sysdate) - 2 and trunc(sysdate) - 1 order by COMPONENT , START_TIME
